item.title: Carpentries-style Lesson on R’s Bug Tracking Process
item.description: CW22 - 2022-04-04 Hack Day Idea proposer Saranjeet Kaur Bhogal, Heather Turner Hack Day Idea title (provisional) Carpentries-style Lesson on R’s Bug Tracking Process Hack Day Pitch Context and/or research domain Software sustainability. Problem We have been conducting monthly ‘Collaboration Campfires’ that are informal sessions to discuss and learn how to contribute to the R project. These campfires are a part of the Digital Infrastructure Incubator by the Code for Science & Society.
